pages.disclaimers: HiddenValley Resort - Disclaimers and Legal Notices HiddenValley Home About us Casino Contact What to Know Before You Explore We're thrilled to share information about Hidden Valley Resort! This website is designed to provide a general overview of our offerings. While we keep things updated as best we can, please note that the content here is for informational purposes only. We can't guarantee everything will be absolutely perfect or applicable to every situation. You'll also find links to other websites throughout our pages. These links are simply there to offer you more resources, and we don't necessarily endorse everything you might find on those external sites. We have no control over their content, so be sure to explore them with a critical eye. Lastly, while we hope you have a fantastic experience at Hidden Valley Resort, please understand that we cannot be held liable for any loss or damage that might occur during your visit. This includes things like indirect or consequential losses, or anything related to data or profits. We reserve the right to make changes to this section at any time, so be sure to check back occasionally for updates. pages.privacy-policy: HiddenValley Resort - Privacy Policy HiddenValley Home About us Casino Contact Privacy Policy At Hidden Valley Resort, we value your privacy. This statement explains how we gather, utilize, and safeguard your personal data when you interact with our website or utilize our offerings. Data Acquisition and Application We may gather various kinds of data from you, encompassing your name, contact details, payment information, and preferences. This data is employed to deliver and enhance our services, tailor your experience, and keep you informed. Information Sharing Practices We are committed to not selling, trading, or otherwise transferring your personal information to external parties unless we provide you with prior notification. This excludes trusted third-party collaborators who assist us in operating our website, conducting business activities, or providing services to you, on the condition that these parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of this information. Security Measures We have implemented safeguards to uphold the security of your personal data when you provide, submit, or access your information. Updates to this Statement Hidden Valley Resort reserves the right to update this Privacy Statement periodically. We will keep you informed of any changes by publishing the revised statement on this page. The HiddenValley website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on accomodations website. Accept or Decline.
